testcase.name: runScenario

error.message: Step [I set currency code as {string} and value as {string}] is defined with 0 parameters at 'steps.Steps.I_set_currency_code_and_value()'. However, the gherkin step has 2 arguments: * "USD" * "500.00" Step text: I set currency code as "USD" and value as "500.00"
